doc.field: Seems to be a set of 4 binders used by Spadafora for filing notices for professional reference or maybe initially as his fire tech/promotion training in the 1980s; labels indicate a core purpose, but various documents inserted and annotated over time. Binder labeled "ABC" (All Borough Circulars): 1980s-circa 2005 (one document is a summary of safety command investigative report for a fatal fire at 2530 Atlantic Ave in Brooklyn, 1999). Binder labeled "Regulations" which includes ref material/prep tests on various regs, including administrative ones, like applying for meritorious awards; holds photocopies of some narratives & applications for such awards. Binder labeled "TB (Training Bulletin): Foam" includes ref material/tests on that and on other hazards, 1980s-90s. Binder labeled "Communications" includes tests, etc., for 1980s-90s, with FDNY manual (revoked 1987); inserted is FDNY booklet "Developing Continuity of Operations Within FDNY", 2004. A fifth binder is unrelated, with a few reference materials on general investment strategies.
